name: Crowne Plaza Toulouse

reviews.text: I went here for a business trip but later my 2 families member joined, for a room for 3 people they dont provide triple room, therefore the sharing was not good. The cleanliness is 5-star class but a bit lack of facilities (e.g: Pool) also got excellent meeting rooms for business. Lots of other tenants are here for business too.
reviews.title: Tiny room, but strategic location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is situated right in the middle of Toulouse, so is perfectly located for exploring the shops and restaurants of the city. It is on the corner of the main square and there is a buzzy market at the weekends selling food of all descriptions and other wares.
reviews.title: Great Location

reviews.text: The room was clean and adequate with a really large bathroom, the rooms are nicely decorated and big enough, there is free wifi but the speed is slow, beds are comfortable and there are plenty of fresh clean towels.
reviews.title: Crown Plaza Sep 2013

reviews.text: Breakfast was good and the restaurant pleasant and bright with a nice courtyard at the rear.
reviews.title: First rate service in an emergency, great location!

reviews.text: All stuff were courteous and efficient.
reviews.title: The desk staff ignore you as an inconvenience

reviews.text: Toulouse is actually a small city. This hotel is at its heart, right on the square. Easy walking distance to the metro, sight seeing, restaurants. The hotel meets all Crown Plaza standards. The rooms were adequate in size, comfortable, clean; bedding was good and mattress firm. The staff has excellent command of English. Book early for a reasonable rate.
reviews.title: just the facts, ma'am

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were very courteous and helpful and our room was spacious and clean. Breakfast was delicious and had good variety. My only complaint with this hotel is that the Club access is not worth paying for. It was the worst food and variety of drinks were really poor. The lounge area is not welcoming at all. I wouldn't offer that level of accommodation unless you can live up to the standard that is required.
reviews.title: Fantastic Location
Good place to stay
reviews.text: On the plus side, there was a laser lighting competition on the wall of the buildings in Place Capitol e and we sat at our window and watched this amazing show put to music as well. I saw it for the two nights we were staying at the hotel. Now, that was a bonus!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have stayed at several hotels in Toulouse and they have all been "so French". The Crowne Plaza offers a different and more general European feeling. Great beds, big rooms, clean, friendly, big bar, great location and not expensive. I paid €118 per night.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel in great location

reviews.text: Our 1st hotel for long awaited break in South West France. Arrived early and the attentive staff kindly checked us in early before we went to a Stade Toulousain rugby match. Staff and concierge were very helpful and knowledgable. Lovely rooms and great location by Place Capitole in centre of Toulouse. Comfy beds and all round great overnight stay. Will go back and stay again.
reviews.title: Not so great

reviews.text: After driving for 3 days & previously stay in budget accomadation it was a delight to book in & find such a luxurious room awaiting.Everything was spotlesly clean,bathrooms stocked & shower powerful.The locations was great to in the heart of the Plaza with fine resturants left & right if there was any small flaw parking was difficult.Thanks for the stay keep up the good work Crowne Plaza
reviews.title: Fabulous rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here on the drive from uk to Marbella . It was just as difficult to get to as previous reviews suggest. In the end I got out of the car to ask very friendly passers by. All in all not a nightmare, but the irritation was more than compensated for by the incredibly helpful and humorous front desk staff. Parking was 17 euros, which I thought reasonable for such an amazing location. The room was spotlessly clean and had been recentl renovated. We had noticed when planning that Toulouse has Many Michelin starred restaurants and the Guest Relations manager was incredibly helpful in getting us a reservation and organising a taxi. In hindsight we should have spent the evening soaking up Toulouse delightful sights and atmosphere bearing in mind the wonderful location
reviews.title: Fantastic location -super helpful staff

reviews.text: I woul definitely recommend this hotel and use it again
reviews.title: Location is everything!
Great location, great service
reviews.text: The Crowne Plaza is in the perfect location to explore the lovely city of Toulouse. Walking out the front door of the hotel you will find restaurants, shopping, and ever changing markets held in the Capitole Square. You are within walking distance of museums, cathedrals, and many local sights. If the buffet breakfast is included in the price of your room, by all means feast on the eggs, meats, and sides of fruit, cereal, and pastries. I did hear that the price was quite high, however, if not included. The club room is very basic but the wines for the afternoon cocktail hour were good. Our room was very clean and very quiet, a plus for a hotel in the midst of things. The front desk staff was friendly and knowledgeable. One of the members of our party who left the day before we did thought that he may have left something in his room and asked my husband to check on it. The front desk was unable to check with the housekeeping staff because it was a holiday but they did follow up the next day, however, and emailed my husband to let him know what they found. The city is undergoing a lot of construction, with many streets being turned into pedestrian thoroughfares, something of which many GPS’s are not yet aware, making for a potentially frustrating drive to the hotel. There is an underground parking garage directly across from the hotel.

I can't really comment on the price aspect as we got a room for free using my points, but the hotel is definitely well located right on the place du Capitole which is the heart of the city. From there, you can easily access all the major attractions of Toulouse, and you are within a 5-7mn walk from the Garonne river, and its nice cafes (Place St Pierre etc...)
reviews.title: Great Location but a parking nightmare

reviews.text: The hotel is centrally location in central Toulouse. Within steps of the hotel, there are restaurants, shops and ATM.
reviews.title: Excellent location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel staff is friendly. Ran into an issue with the sheets in the room but ti was promptly taken care of. The restaurant staff could be better, some with poor attitudes.
reviews.title: Toulouse

reviews.text: Overall I would recommend this hotel and probably would return in the future.
reviews.title: best location and very good value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is in a good location -great for walking to the main tourist places. Is right next to the main plaza! Rooms are a fair size. Staff are friendly. The breakfast is fantastic - def include in your room rate.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel in great location

reviews.text: we had a last minute deal this summer in toulouse and were very happy to find this very central hôtel. staff was friendly and helpfull and room confortable.
reviews.title: Ideal location to explore the city.

description: The Crowne Plaza Toulouse Hotel is situated 15 minutes from the International airport Blagnac, in the heart of the pink city, on one of the most beautiful square in Europe, the Capitole square.Our establishment is one of the prestigious of the town. From our hotel, you can visit the St Sernin Basilica, the Augustins museum, the entire monastery of the Jacobins or to make a getaway along the banks of the Garonne and the Canal du Midi.The Crowne Plaza Toulouse Hotel has 162 rooms which 113 non-smoking rooms, suites and executive rooms elegantly decorated with views on our Patios or on the Capitole square.Our Gastronomic restaurant called L Autan-tic invites you to a discovery on the best French traditional dishes. For those who are looking for a light cooking, our Summery Restaurant, The Grand Patio proposes salads and provenÃ§al grills. And to finish your evenings, the Plaza Bar welcomes you to spend Jazzy nights every Tuesdays and Thursdays.Our 300 m Seminar Spaces equipped with a Wifi internet access that constitutes a ideal surrounding to organise all your events.
